Interface ArgPosition

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface ArgPosition

      • deepCopy

        ArgPosition deepCopy()

      • depth

        int depth()
        Get the nesting depth of this arg position. Top-level argument positions have depth 1.
        Returns:
        the nesting depth of this arg position

        Returns:
        this ArgPosition.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        this ArgPosition.

      • first

        Integer first()
        Get the first element in this arg position's path. This is the argument number of the argument of the top-level formula that contains this position.
        Returns:
        the argument number.

      • getPath

        List<Integer> getPath()
        Get the list of argnums for this arg position, from top level to deepest level.
        Returns:
        the list of argnums for this arg position,

      • isPrefixOf

        boolean isPrefixOf(ArgPosition otherArgPositionI)
        Check if this arg position is for an ancestor of another arg position.
        Parameters:
        otherArgPositionI -
        Returns:
        true iff his arg position is for an ancestor of otherArgPosition

      • last

        Integer last()
        Get the argnum of the designated argument in its immediate context.
        Returns:
        the argnum of the designated argument

      • matchingArgPositionI

        boolean matchingArgPositionI(ArgPosition candidate,
                           boolean matchEmpty)
        Does this arg position match candidate?
        Parameters:
        candidate -
        matchEmpty - Should we match the null arg position?
        Returns:
        true iff this arg position matches candidate

      • toParent

        ArgPosition toParent()
        Destructively modify this ArgPosition to be its parent arg position.
        Returns:
        this ArgPosition.
